title: Lesson 63
paragraph: Continuity and expansion strengthen systems. Coordinating actions, colonizing new areas, and maintaining professionalism ensure growth and coherence.

words.example: Continuousness of service is essential in healthcare.
Traffic flow was smooth on the highway.

words.meaning: to establish control over a new area
words.example: Humans colonized new planets in the story.
The company centralized its operations in Tokyo.
Workers decided to strike for better wages.

words.meaning: able to be measured or assessed
words.example: The risk is gaugeable with proper data.

words.meaning: relating to a job requiring skill; expert
to live or exist in a place
words.example: Many species reside in the forest.

words.japaneseMeaning: 一貫した、まとまりのある
words.example: His argument was coherent and convincing.
